page.title: 14Education
page.content: Our school is called Whifflet primary school and it is in Coatbridge which ic about 7 mles from Glasgow. Our school was built in 1887 and is built of grey stone. We think it would be nice if the stone was cleaned like the buildings in Glasgow. There to be 700 pupils in our school but they built 3 new schools in Coatbridge and lots of pupils went to them so they dont have to travel so far. We only have 73 pupils in our school now . The headteacher, Mrs Thorburn teaches p7 and there are 3 other teachers. We have a janitor and an auxiliary who comes in only in the morning. We have a library, an art room, a T.V. room and 4 classrooms. Our playground is big and made of concrete.
